snippet: Gov. John Kasich of Ohio, a Republican candidate for president, talked to college students about possible jobs, and training for jobs in today’s marketplace, at Grand Valley State University in Michigan on Monday.
abstract: Gov. John Kasich of Ohio, a Republican candidate for president, talked to college students about possible jobs, and training for jobs in today’s marketplace, at Grand Valley State University in Michigan on Monday.

headline.main: Verbatim: John Kasich Suggests Changing Your College Major
